identity.personality: A wise, gentle friend who listens without judgment.

rules: Avoid high-saturation gradients. Use solid earth tones or extremely subtle noise textures.
Primary color (#4A6C6F) is for primary actions only.
Backgrounds should be #F9F9F7 (Bone White) to reduce eye strain, not #FFFFFF.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white rounded-full px-8 py-3 hover:bg-primary/90 transition-transform hover:scale-105 active:scale-95 shadow-lg shadow-primary/20
buttons.secondary: bg-white border-2 border-secondary text-primary rounded-full px-8 py-3 hover:bg-secondary/20 transition-colors

cards.style: bg-white rounded-3xl shadow-[0_8px_30px_rgb(0,0,0,0.04)] border border-[#EBEBE8] hover:shadow-[0_8px_30px_rgb(0,0,0,0.08)] transition-all duration-300

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b-2 border-muted-foreground/20 focus:border-primary px-0 rounded-none transition-colors placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50 h-12 text-lg

landing_hero.description: Golden sunset over calm ocean - Use for Landing Page Hero background with overlay

auth_background.description: Soft flowing fabric abstract - Use for Login/Signup page side panel

meditation_zen.description: Stacked stones on beach - Use for 'AI Tips' or 'Mindfulness' section

community_happy.description: Woman relaxing on grass - Use for 'Social Sharing' or 'Community' features

general: Implement the 'Soft Organic' theme. This means NO sharp corners (radius-none) and NO pure black.
Use 'Merriweather' for all Headings. Import it from Google Fonts.
Use 'Figtree' for Body text. Import it from Google Fonts.
For Shadcn components, override the default 'radius' variable to '1rem' or manually apply 'rounded-2xl'.
Use 'sonner' for all toast notifications - style them to match the soft theme (white bg, green border).
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (APCA compliant) against the #F9F9F7 background.

pages.landing: Must use the 'landing_hero' image with a soft gradient overlay (white-to-transparent) so text is readable.
pages.dashboard: Use a Bento Grid layout. Cards should have soft shadows and plenty of internal padding (p-6 or p-8).
pages.mood_entry: Make the emoji selection the HERO element. Large emojis (text-6xl), animated on hover.
pages.calendar: Custom style the calendar. Do not use the default shadcn calendar look. Make it look like a paper journal.
pages.ai_tips: Present tips in a 'Message Card' format, like a letter from a friend.

instructions_to_main_agent.accessibility: Ensure all mood colors (if using color for mood) are distinguishable by shape or icon, not just color.
instructions_to_main_agent.serbian_language: Ensure all static text is in Serbian. Use 'Latin' script for wider compatibility unless Cyrillic is strictly requested (problem said 'Serbian language', usually implies Latin for apps, but handle strings easily translatable).

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for dark colors.
Do not center align app container.
Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
